jobInfo.postDescription:
Key Responsibilities: 主要职责

Provide pre-sales and post-sales technical support to sales team, channel-partners (reps, distributors, systems integrators etc…) and end-users. Such support includes:
向销售团队和渠道合作伙伴（代理，分销，系统集成商等）及最终用户提供售前和售后技术支持，这些技术支持包含：
	Configure test systems to meet customers’ requirements
根据用户需求配置测试系统
	Product demonstration 
产品演示
	Presentation of systems proposal to potential customers
对潜在用户讲解系统方案
	System installation at customer sites
用户端的系统安装调试
	Operation / Application training at customer sites
提供用户操作和应用的培训
	Commissioning and acceptance of installed test systems
系统安装后的运行和验收 
	Post-installation application support to end-users
针对最终用户安装后的应用支持
	Factory- or customer-initiated hardware and/or software upgrade
工厂或者教导用户进行软件和硬件的升级
	System troubleshooting to identify faulty parts/modules
系统故障排查和查找故障模块
	Replace faulty parts/modules
故障模块的更换
	If necessary, communicate and coordinate with factory for above activities
如果需要，和工厂沟通和协调以上行动

Requirements：
基本要求：
1.	Minimum relevant engineering Bachelor degree
至少相关工程师学士学历
2.	Basic knowledge of electrical/electronic test systems
对电子/电气测试系统有一定的了解
3.	Good written and spoken English
英语书面表达良好和口语流利
4.	Mature, good communication skill 
成熟，良好的交流能力
5.	A team player who is able to work independently
能够独立承担工作
6.	Strong customer-service mindset
较强的客户服务意识
7.	To be based in Shanghai Minhang district.
工作地点上海闵行
8.	Frequent business travel required
需要经常出差
jobInfo.address: 上海闵行区世宏金源中心
